content.rendered:
Simply natural. Simply better.

High-performance allografts provide rapid tissue integration with low inflammatory response1

SimpliDerm is a pliable, easy-to-handle, hydrated human acellular dermal matrix (hADM) designed to preserve the structural integrity of native dermis. It is intended for use as a structural tissue matrix to support the body’s normal healing process.

  • Cellular repopulation and functional properties similar to native dermis for a healthy regenerative response
  • Lower chronic inflammatory and fibrotic responses demonstrated in a non-human primate model
  • Rapid tissue support integration into the recipient site
  • Greater suture retention
  • Sterility assurance level (SAL) of 10-6
1. Ji H, et al. Plast Reconstr Surg Glob Open. 2021 Feb 16;9(2):e3420

Advanced science.
Proven results.

Better processing leads to better biocompatibility

SimpliDerm demonstrated lower inflammatory response, robust integration, and lower fibrotic response than AlloDerm™ RTU in a non-human primate model.1

1. Ji H, et al. Plast Reconstr Surg Glob Open. 2021 Feb 16;9(2):e3420
2. Elutia data on file

A versatile product portfolio.

Simply natural. Simply better. SimpliDerm.

Contact a Representative
